definition.datasource: ds.result = "" if ds.$(name)_saveallimages: if "$var.filename": ds.result = ("$var.filename").split("/")[-1].split(".")[0] + "/" ds.result += "$(name)/" +str(ds.$(name)_savefilename) + "_m3." + str(ds.$(name)_filepostfix) + "://entry/$(__insname__)/detector" $datasources.$(name)_saveallimages $datasources.$(name)_savefilename $datasources.$(name)_filepostfix
